pages.title: Quartz Ore
pages.text: Quartz ore can be found in any type of rock.

pages.title: Amber Ore
pages.text: Amber ore can also be found in any type of rock.

pages.title: Cinnabar Ore
pages.text: Cinnabar ore can be found in some types of rock, these are the following: basalt, rhyolite, quartzite, andesite, dacite and shale.$(br2)These ores drop quicksilver, which are used in Thaumcraft.
